Title: Verify that user can add a product to the cart from product details page.
Precondition: User is logged in and on the product details page
Steps:
1. Open homepage or product category list
2. Click on a product (e.g., ID = 7)
3. Verify product name, price, and description are displayed correctly
4. Click “Add to Cart”
5. Confirm success message or handle failure
Expected Result:
Confirmation alert appears
Product is listed in cart with correct name and price
Product is not added if user is not logged in (if login is required)
TestData:
Product ID: 7
Name: Bluetooth Headset
Price: EGP 350
Actual Result:
Alert “Product added successfully” appeared after clicking “Add to Car
Product name and price matched the catalog details in the cart
System redirected to login page and product was not added
